tier_1.notes: Weak tier, uncommon in end-game content

tier_2.notes: STRONGEST tier, HIGH VALUE for survivability (Clan Boss, dungeons, Faction Wars). This is the GOLD STANDARD buff.

effect.description: Increases all allies' DEF by X%, reducing damage taken from ALL sources. CRITICAL for survivability in sustained fights (Clan Boss, long dungeon boss fights).
effect.notes: Increase DEF is MULTIPLICATIVE damage reduction buff. 60% DEF increase = ~40% damage reduction. Stacks with Decrease ATK 50% for ~70% total damage reduction. PREMIUM buff for Clan Boss.

damage_reduction_calculation.formula: See Damage_Formulas.json for DEF reduction formula. Short version: Higher DEF = less damage taken.

champion_base_def_3000.notes: Champion with 3000 DEF: DEF reduction = 3000 / (3000 + 1200) = 0.714. Champion takes ONLY 28.6% of incoming damage (71.4% damage reduction from DEF).

increase_def_30_percent.notes: Increase DEF 30%: Champion DEF increases to 3900 (3000 × 1.30). DEF reduction = 3900 / (3900 + 1200) = 0.765. Champion takes 23.5% of incoming damage (vs 28.6% base). Damage reduction = 18% (28.6% - 23.5% / 28.6% = 0.18). MODERATE survivability increase.

increase_def_60_percent.notes: Increase DEF 60%: Champion DEF increases to 4800 (3000 × 1.60). DEF reduction = 4800 / (4800 + 1200) = 0.80. Champion takes 20% of incoming damage (vs 28.6% base). Damage reduction = 30% (28.6% - 20% / 28.6% = 0.30). SIGNIFICANT survivability increase.

increase_def_60_plus_decrease_atk_50.notes: UNM turn 50 AOE (37,500 damage). With Decrease ATK 50% (18,750 damage) + Increase DEF 60% (champion takes 20% of damage): Champion takes 3,750 damage (18,750 × 0.20). Total damage reduction = 90% (3,750 / 37,500 = 0.10, champion takes ONLY 10% of boss base damage). MASSIVE survivability increase.

brogni.notes: Brogni A3 is PREMIUM Increase DEF 60% skill. Also applies Shield 30% MAX HP (24k shield, dual buff). 2-turn duration, 4-turn CD = 40% uptime. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for Clan Boss survivability. CRITICAL: Brogni applies BOTH Increase DEF 60% AND Shield (double survivability buff).

jareg.notes: Jareg A3 is PREMIUM Increase DEF 60% skill. Also places Ally Protection (redirects damage to Jareg, dual buff). 2-turn duration, 5-turn CD = 33% uptime. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for Clan Boss survivability (Increase DEF + Ally Protection = team takes ~10% of boss damage).

corpulent_cadaver.notes: Corpulent Cadaver A2 is Increase DEF 60% skill (BUDGET Rare champion, easy to obtain). 2-turn duration, 4-turn CD = 40% uptime. BUDGET option for Increase DEF 60% (no additional buffs like Brogni shield or Jareg Ally Protection).

strategy_1_lasting_gifts_mastery.effect: 30% chance to extend buff duration by 1 turn
strategy_1_lasting_gifts_mastery.notes: Lasting Gifts is HIGH VALUE for Increase DEF champions. Extends 2-turn duration → 3-turn duration (30% of time), increasing uptime by 30%. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for Brogni, Jareg, etc.

strategy_2_buff_extension_godseeker_anir.effect: Extends all ally buff durations by 1 turn (100% chance)
strategy_2_buff_extension_godseeker_anir.notes: Godseeker Aniri A2 is PREMIUM for Increase DEF teams. Extends 2-turn duration → 3-turn duration (100% of time), increasing uptime by 50%. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for Brogni/Jareg teams (Increase DEF + Shield both extended).

strategy_3_multiple_sources.secondary_source: Jareg A3 (33% uptime, also Ally Protection)
strategy_3_multiple_sources.notes: Multiple Increase DEF sources increase uptime. Brogni A3 (40% uptime) + Jareg A3 (33% uptime) = 60% combined uptime (at least 1 Increase DEF active 60% of time). PREMIUM survivability combo.

clan_boss.survivability_impact: Increase DEF 60% reduces damage taken by 30%. Turn 50 AOE damage drops from 37,500 → 26,250 per champion (without Decrease ATK). With Decrease ATK 50% + Increase DEF 60%, damage drops to 3,750 per champion (90% total damage reduction).
clan_boss.priority: HIGH PRIORITY buff for survivability (2nd tier after Decrease ATK 50%, but stacks with it for 90% damage reduction)
clan_boss.uptime_criticality: Higher uptime = longer survival. 60% uptime (Brogni + Jareg) = team survives 60+ turns. 40% uptime (Brogni only) = team survives 50-55 turns.
clan_boss.notes: Increase DEF 60% is CRITICAL for Clan Boss survivability. Combined with Decrease ATK 50%, team takes ONLY 10% of boss damage (90% total damage reduction). HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for all CB teams.

dungeons.wave_clear_impact: MODERATE VALUE (waves die fast, but Increase DEF prevents RNG deaths from high-damage waves)
dungeons.boss_impact: HIGH VALUE for long boss fights (Fire Knight, Spider, Ice Golem). Reduces boss damage by 30%, increases team survival.
dungeons.notes: Increase DEF 60% is HIGH VALUE for dungeon boss fights. MODERATE VALUE for wave clear (waves die fast, but Increase DEF prevents RNG one-shots).

arena.defensive_impact: Increase DEF 60% reduces enemy nuke damage by 30%. CRITICAL for defensive teams (stall teams, revive teams).
arena.offensive_impact: LOW VALUE (offensive teams focus on speed + nuke, no time for Increase DEF)
arena.notes: Increase DEF 60% is HIGH VALUE for defensive Arena teams (reduces enemy nuke damage, enables survival + revive/heal). LOW VALUE for offensive teams.

faction_wars.wave_clear_impact: HIGH VALUE (waves hit HARD in stages 18-21, Increase DEF reduces damage by 30%)
faction_wars.boss_impact: CRITICAL for boss kills (bosses hit HARD, Increase DEF reduces damage by 30%)
faction_wars.notes: Increase DEF 60% is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for Faction Wars (especially stages 18-21). Waves and bosses hit HARD. Increase DEF reduces damage, enables team survival. PREMIUM buff for FW progression.

decrease_atk_50.description: Decrease ATK 50% halves boss damage. Increase DEF 60% reduces damage by 30%. Combined = 85% total damage reduction (boss deals 50% damage, team takes 70% of that = 35% of base damage, or 65% reduction from Increase DEF, total 85%).
decrease_atk_50.example: UNM turn 50 AOE (37,500 damage). With Decrease ATK 50% (18,750 damage) + Increase DEF 60% (team takes 20% of damage): Team takes 3,750 damage per champion (18,750 × 0.20). Total damage reduction = 90% (3,750 / 37,500 = 0.10).
decrease_atk_50.notes: Decrease ATK + Increase DEF is PREMIUM survivability combo. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for Clan Boss. Team takes ONLY 10% of boss damage with both buffs/debuffs active.

shield.description: Shield absorbs damage BEFORE HP. Increase DEF 60% reduces damage by 30%, then shield absorbs remainder. Combined = MASSIVE damage mitigation (damage reduced, then absorbed).
shield.example: UNM turn 50 AOE (37,500 damage). With Increase DEF 60% (26,250 damage) + Brogni 24k shield: Shield absorbs 24,000, overflow 2,250 to HP (vs 13,500 overflow without Increase DEF). Increase DEF + Shield = NEAR-FULL damage negation.
shield.notes: Increase DEF + Shield is PREMIUM survivability combo. Brogni A3 applies BOTH buffs (Increase DEF 60% + Shield 24k). HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for Clan Boss.

ally_protection.description: Ally Protection redirects damage from weak champions to tanky champion. Increase DEF 60% reduces damage taken by tanky champion. Combined = tanky champion takes 30% less damage while protecting team.
ally_protection.example: Jareg (tanky champion) with Ally Protection + Increase DEF 60%: Redirects ALL team damage to Jareg (5× damage), but Jareg takes 30% less damage (Increase DEF 60%). Jareg survives, team survives.
ally_protection.notes: Increase DEF + Ally Protection is TOP TIER survivability combo. Jareg A3 applies BOTH buffs (Increase DEF 60% + Ally Protection). HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for Clan Boss (protect weak DPS champions).

buff_extension.description: Godseeker Aniri A2 (100% extend +1 turn) or Lasting Gifts T6 (30% extend +1 turn) extends Increase DEF duration. 2-turn buff → 3-turn buff = +50% uptime.
buff_extension.impact: Brogni A3 Increase DEF uptime increases from 40% → 60% (with Godseeker Aniri A2). Team survival increases from 50-55 turns → 60+ turns.
buff_extension.notes: Buff extension is HIGH VALUE for Increase DEF. Godseeker Aniri A2 is PREMIUM for Brogni/Jareg teams (100% extend +1 turn = +50% Increase DEF uptime). HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

mistake_1_using_low_tier_increase_def.mistake: Using Increase DEF 30% instead of Increase DEF 60%
mistake_1_using_low_tier_increase_def.impact: Increase DEF 30% = 18% damage reduction (vs 30% for 60%). Team takes 82% of damage (vs 70% for 60%). SIGNIFICANT survivability loss.
mistake_1_using_low_tier_increase_def.solution: ALWAYS prioritize Increase DEF 60% champions (Brogni, Jareg, Corpulent Cadaver). Do NOT use Increase DEF 30% champions in end-game content (massive survivability loss).

mistake_2_increase_def_without_decrease_.mistake: Relying on Increase DEF 60% alone without Decrease ATK 50%
mistake_2_increase_def_without_decrease_.impact: UNM turn 50 AOE (37,500 damage). With Increase DEF 60% only (26,250 damage per champion, no Decrease ATK). Team takes 26,250 damage per AOE (massive HP drain). Team survival drops from 60+ turns (with Decrease ATK) → 45 turns (without).
mistake_2_increase_def_without_decrease_.solution: ALWAYS pair Increase DEF 60% with Decrease ATK 50%. Increase DEF + Decrease ATK = 90% total damage reduction (team takes ONLY 10% of boss damage). Increase DEF alone is NOT sufficient for 60+ turn survival.

mistake_3_not_taking_lasting_gifts.mistake: Not taking Lasting Gifts T6 on Increase DEF champions (Brogni, Jareg)
mistake_3_not_taking_lasting_gifts.impact: Brogni A3 Increase DEF uptime drops from 52% (with Lasting Gifts) to 40% (without). Team survival drops from 60+ turns → 50-55 turns. Damage output drops (fewer turns alive = less damage dealt).
mistake_3_not_taking_lasting_gifts.solution: ALWAYS take Lasting Gifts T6 on Increase DEF champions (Brogni, Jareg, etc.). +30% uptime = longer team survival = more damage dealt. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

mistake_4_not_using_buff_extension.mistake: Not using buff extension (Godseeker Aniri A2) for Increase DEF-heavy teams
mistake_4_not_using_buff_extension.impact: Increase DEF uptime drops from 60% (with buff extension) to 40% (without). Team survival drops from 60+ turns → 50-55 turns. Damage output drops (fewer turns alive = less damage dealt).
mistake_4_not_using_buff_extension.solution: USE buff extension for Increase DEF-heavy teams. Godseeker Aniri A2 (100% extend +1 turn) is PREMIUM for Brogni/Jareg teams. +50% uptime = longer team survival. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

mistake_5_confusing_increase_def_with_de.mistake: Thinking Increase DEF and Decrease ATK are equivalent (both reduce damage taken)
mistake_5_confusing_increase_def_with_de.impact: Decrease ATK 50% = 50% damage reduction (boss deals HALF damage). Increase DEF 60% = ~30% damage reduction (team takes ~70% damage). Decrease ATK is STRONGER per buff/debuff. Both stack multiplicatively (use both for 90% total damage reduction).
mistake_5_confusing_increase_def_with_de.solution: Understand Decrease ATK is STRONGER per buff/debuff (50% vs 30%). Use BOTH buffs/debuffs if possible (Decrease ATK 50% + Increase DEF 60% = 90% total damage reduction). PREMIUM survivability combo.
